product_name: Marmot Hyper Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Marmot Hyper Rain Jacket is built to keep you dry during active pursuits. With built-in stretch, this jacket moves with you so you don't have to trade mobility for dry comfort. Waterproof, windproof and breathable, the Marmot MemBrain(R) Strata 2.5-layer nylon shell is soft yet durable and packable; micro-stitched, taped seams seal out the wet. 4-way stretch allows freedom of movement. Hood has ERG adjustment system for unhindered visibility. Water-resistant front zipper keeps the rain out, and it features a contrasting color for style. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Marmot Hyper Rain Jacket for women features zippered hand pockets. Drawcord hem seals out the cold; asymmetrical cuffs feature built-in elastic for a perfect fit. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Marmot Hyper Rain Jacket is built to keep you dry during active pursuits. With built-in stretch, this jacket moves with you so you don't have to trade mobility for dry comfort.
